event.title: 1524, the Italian navigator Giovanni da Verrazzano and his crew visited

data.event: In 1524, the Italian navigator Giovanni da Verrazzano and his crew visited Narragansett Bay.
In 1636 or 1637, "Dutch Island" was used by fur traders.
In 1638 the English made arrangements to use Conanicut Island for grazing sheep.
In 1678, Conanicut Island was incorporated as the town of Jamestown.
